title: Indrani Jadau Kanthi - Emerald and Kundan Choker
materials: 22K Gold; Natural Emerald Beads; Rose Quartz Cabochon; Polki Diamonds (Kundan); Hyderabadi Polish
features: A beautifully crafted Kanthi featuring five strands of meticulously strung emerald beads. The centerpiece is a radiant Jadau pendant with a Rose Quartz cabochon, surrounded by uncut Polki diamonds set in the traditional Kundan style. The gold setting features delicate filigree work, showcasing Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of timeless elegance is desired. Also appropriate for upscale modern events.
description: This Indrani Kanthi is a testament to the enduring allure of traditional Hyderabadi jewelry. The rare combination of natural emerald beads with the rose quartz and Polki diamond pendant creates a unique and captivating design. A heirloom piece that will be treasured for generations, representing both cultural heritage and exquisite artistry. The use of high-quality materials ensures both durability and lasting beauty.
